bio: They pursue power and often turn to dark and forbidden magic, caring little about the well-being of their people.
description: <bulletlist><bullet>Cities can ignore penalties from low <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Has higher <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income and gains extra income from <hyperlink>Prison</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Crypt</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Units specialize in inflicting <hyperlink>Negative Status Effect</hyperlink> and exploiting them with <hyperlink>Cull the weak</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>-10 <hyperlink>Alignment</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
lore: A dictatorial civilization where the strong and ruthless dominate the weak. They use forbidden magics to maintain control and weaken their enemies.
name: Dark
tome_description: This research is available to rulers with the <hyperlink>Dark</hyperlink> culture. They specialize in inflicting <hyperlink>Negative Status Effect</hyperlink> and subterfuge.

description: At the end of this unit's turn, adjacent enemy units have a base <SUNDERED_RESISTANCE_RESISTANCE>ResolvedStrength></SUNDERED_RESISTANCE_RESISTANCE>ResolvedStrength>% chance of receiving:<bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Sundered defense</hyperlink></bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Sundered resistance</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Dark Stalwart

description: Deals damage to enemies in a <DARK_SURGE_TARGETER>AREA>Length></DARK_SURGE_TARGETER>AREA>Length>-hex cone. Deals double damage to units with a <hyperlink>Negative Status Effect</hyperlink>.
name: Dark Surge

bio: They hold honor and valor in high regard and fight to uphold their laws wherever they go.
description: <bulletlist><bullet>Low Unit Upkeep.</bullet><bullet>Powerful cavalry units.</bullet></bulletlist>
lore: A hierarchical society where nobles reign over their subjects. They field exceptionally cheap to maintain armies and specialize in the use of cavalry.
name: Feudal
tome_description: This research is available to rulers with the <hyperlink>Feudal</hyperlink> culture. They specialize in cheap troops and leadership.

description: Unit gets promoted to a Knight unit upon reaching Legendary rank.
name: Knight Training

combat_unit_property_description: The Liege Lord of this unit's House is on the battlefield, granting it:<bulletlist><bullet>+<LIEGE_LORD_STAT_BONUS>BONUS>HitPoints></LIEGE_LORD_STAT_BONUS>BONUS>HitPoints> <hyperlink>{LOC.CONCEPT@HITPOINTS@NAME}</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>+<LIEGE_LORD_MORALE_BONUS>MoraleBonus></LIEGE_LORD_MORALE_BONUS>MoraleBonus> <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
description:
This hero is the Liege Lord of their House, granting them and House units in their army:-ResolvedUpkeepModifier>ResolvedUpkeepModifier>% base Unit UpkeepHeal +BONUS>Regen>BONUS>Regen> {LOC.CONCEPT@HITPOINTS@NAME} per Turn
In battle, they and all units of their House gain:+BONUS>HitPoints>BONUS>HitPoints> {LOC.CONCEPT@HITPOINTS@NAME}+MoraleBonus>MoraleBonus> Morale

This bonus increases as this Hero gains Renown.
name: Liege Lord

description: Your cities form powerful Houses, able to field efficient armies when led by their Liege Lords:<bulletlist><bullet>Each city has a <hyperlink>Feudal House</hyperlink> led by its governor, who becomes the House's <hyperlink>Liege lord</hyperlink>.<bullet></bullet>Units produced in Feudal cities become part of that city's <hyperlink>Feudal House</hyperlink>, gaining <hyperlink><xp></xp> Experience</hyperlink> as their Liege Lord gains <renown></renown> <hyperlink>Renown</hyperlink>.<bullet></bullet>Certain units can promote into higher Tier units on attaining Legendary Rank.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Aristocracy

description: Your people are loyal to the absolute rule of their Monarch, gaining power from the presence of their ruler:<bulletlist><bullet>The Ruler gains <hyperlink>Feudal monarchs dominion</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Units gain <hyperlink>For the monarch</hyperlink>.<bullet></bullet>Certain units can promote into higher Tier units on attaining Legendary Rank.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Monarchy

description: While in combat in own Domain or alongside their <hyperlink>Ruler</hyperlink>, this unit gains:<bulletlist><bullet>+1 <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink> and +1 <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>+10% damage</bullet><bullet>+10 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: For the Monarch

combat_prop_description: All friendly units gain the benefit from <hyperlink>For the monarch</hyperlink> as though the Ruler were present.

description: The unit is the absolute Monarch of their faction:<bulletlist><bullet>In combat, activates <hyperlink>For the monarch</hyperlink> on friendly units.</bullet><bullet>While army leader, all units in the army with <hyperlink>For the monarch</hyperlink> cost -<FEUDAL_MONARCHS_DOMINION_UPKEEP_MOD>ResolvedUpkeepModifier></FEUDAL_MONARCHS_DOMINION_UPKEEP_MOD>ResolvedUpkeepModifier>% <hyperlink>Unit Upkeep</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>This unit gains: +<LED_BY_MONARCH_STAT>BONUS>DEFENSE>Armor></LED_BY_MONARCH_STAT>BONUS>DEFENSE>Armor> <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink>, +<LED_BY_MONARCH_STAT>BONUS>DEFENSE>Resistance></LED_BY_MONARCH_STAT>BONUS>DEFENSE>Resistance> <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink>, +<LED_BY_MONARCH_MOD>ResolvedMultiplier></LED_BY_MONARCH_MOD>ResolvedMultiplier>% damage, and +<LED_BY_MONARCH_MORALE>MoraleBonus></LED_BY_MONARCH_MORALE>MoraleBonus> <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>Morale</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

bio: They take great pride in their refined traditions and wish for others to reach similar heights.
description: <bulletlist><bullet>Has higher <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink> and <knowledge></knowledge> <hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> income.</bullet><bullet>Units are strengthened with <hyperlink>Awakened</hyperlink>, revealing their hidden potential.</bullet><bullet>10 <hyperlink>Alignment</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet><hyperlink>Alignment Agenda</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>
lore: A highly developed society whose members strive for harmony. When threatened, however, they wield their guiding light as a weapon.
name: High
tome_description: This research is available to rulers with the <hyperlink>High</hyperlink> culture. They specialize in buffing allies and diplomacy.

bio: They have respect for smiths and other artisans, preferring a strong wall over a decorated palace.

name: Industrious
tome_description: This research is available to rulers with the <hyperlink>Industrious</hyperlink> culture. They specialize in defenses and exploiting natural resources.

bio: They have integrated magic into every level of their society, with mages on the top of their hierarchy.

tome_description: This research is available to rulers with the <hyperlink>Mystic</hyperlink> culture. They specialize in magic damage and spellcasting.

description: Your people are powerful summoners, specializing in magical creatures:<bulletlist><bullet><hyperlink>Magic origin</hyperlink> units gain <hyperlink>Attunement astral resonance</hyperlink>.</bullet><bullet>Collect <hyperlink>Astral Echoes^p</hyperlink> through exploration and research.</bullet><bullet>Use <hyperlink>Echo Infusion</hyperlink> to rank up your <hyperlink>Magic origin</hyperlink> units rapidly.</bullet><bullet>This culture's units gain <hyperlink>Astral connection property auto spell</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

A searing Giant who cleaves realms by molding lava.
